homepage.description: Aitenders, your digital teammate to win tenders, manage contracts and structure the knowledge and expertise of your projects.
homepage.projectSize: What is the size of your projects?
homepage.tenderManagementDescription: Optimize your tender responses. Analyze requirements, collaborate effectively and maximize your chances of success.
homepage.contractExecutionDescription: Manage your projects with confidence. Deliverable tracking, compliance and proactive change management.
homepage.knowledgeManagementDescription: Capitalize on your past knowledge and experiences. Quick access to references, templates and comparables for each new project.

UC1.title: Smart tender analysis
UC1.description: Automatically analyze tender documents to identify key requirements and optimize your responses.

uc2test.title: Collaborative bid management
uc2test.description: Efficiently coordinate your teams during medium tender response preparation.

uc3.title: Large project bid strategy
uc3.description: Develop winning strategies for large-scale tender opportunities.

uc4.title: Small contract tracking
uc4.description: Efficiently manage the execution of your small contracts with adapted tools.

uc5.title: Medium contract management
uc5.description: Master medium-sized contract execution with optimized processes.

uc6.title: Large contract governance
uc6.description: Manage the complexity of large contracts with advanced governance tools.

UC7.title: Project knowledge base
UC7.description: Structure and capitalize on your project teams' knowledge.

UC8.title: Collective intelligence
UC8.description: Leverage your organization's collective expertise to optimize projects.

header_26.title: Your offer, 100% clear, 0% surprises
header_26.subtitle: Discover, manage, and secure every clause from day one.

ai_copilot.title: Your AI copilot that secures the management of your medium-sized projects
ai_copilot.subtitle: The only platform designed to transform medium-sized files (€1M to €10M) into a clear contractual vision from day one.
ai_copilot.step3: Dynamic management of Q&A and versions.

offer_steps_headline.title: We support teams at every stage of the offer

features.feature1_desc: The AI analyzes your RFPs, maps every requirement, and provides a clear vision of the scope.
features.feature1_stat: of documents structured, transformed into a Digital Twin
features.feature1_popup: Aitenders' AI instantly analyzes your tender documents and automatically structures the scope, identifies lots, detects critical interfaces, and maps every requirement. Your teams start with a clear and complete vision of the project.
features.feature2_desc: Continuous monitoring of penalties, liabilities, and deadlines. Every modification is flagged with a measured impact.
features.feature2_popup: Aitenders continuously monitors and analyzes every sensitive clause: penalties, liabilities, critical deadlines, and special conditions. Every modification is tracked, every impact automatically assessed.
features.feature3_desc: Centralized Q&A, versions, and amendments, with full traceability of changes.
features.feature3_popup: Dynamically manage your Q&A, successive versions, and addendums in a centralized environment. Aitenders maintains overall consistency and alerts on the impacts of each modification.

concrete_results.title: Concrete results for your teams
concrete_results.stat2_text: of critical clauses identified and prioritized.
concrete_results.cta_button: Launch the impact simulation for your own projects

projects.title: Systematize the discovery and launch of over 400 tenders per year.
projects.description: CONTEXT: A team of 5 engineers needing to analyze over 400 tenders per year in the consulting engineering field. Tender documents are mainly in English, French, and Spanish. Average of 200 to 300 pages per tender. CLIENT'S OBJECTIVES: Save time in identifying risks and anticipating bottlenecks. Quickly identify if we need to involve partners/subcontractors. Mobilize the support team. Immediately identify Bid / No Bid criteria. Identify the main risks (technical, financial, and legal). IMPLEMENTED SOLUTION: Automatic classification of clauses by categories. Capture of key risks and opportunities. Export and integration into the existing process. Additional note: Setup: 2 hours. Team training limited to 2 x 1h. RESULTS: 20/30% LESS TIME. -10/15H PER PROJECT. €300–500K/YEAR

projects.title: Extract and produce the requirement compliance matrix for a €40M tender.
projects.description: CONTEXT: The project was a partial project for the supply of an integrated metro traction system for a new metro line in France. The client had to identify over 2,000 requirements in about 50 different technical documents. The team consisted of 10 people, involving 3 different Business Units. CLIENT'S OBJECTIVES: Immediately and correctly identify and store all requirements identified by the client. Identify other requirements impacting the scope and costing of the offer. Allow the team to have a standardized and simplified common review around all requirements. Quickly deliver a fully reviewed and accurate compliance matrix to their clients. IMPLEMENTED SOLUTION: Requirement detection. PBS, WBS classification. Import of answers – Association of questions. Version gap analysis (V1 > V2). Requirement coverage. Additional note: One session for Project Directors (1h) to launch the project organization. 1h of training for the rest of the team (9 members). RESULTS: COMPLIANCE MATRIX DELIVERED WITHOUT GAPS. ABOUT 30% LESS TIME ON THE ENTIRE PROCESS

projects.title: Automate your Bid / No Bid: Go from 7,000 opportunities to 700 well-qualified tenders!
projects.description: CONTEXT: Our client receives over 7,000 opportunities per year by email from a sourcing software. The existing filtering system is ineffective as it is based on a few generic keywords. The tender managers have to open each tender and read the first few pages to see if there is potential to be a main contractor or subcontractor on the project. CLIENT'S OBJECTIVES: Drastically reduce the average time spent on the selection process (currently 1 hour per tender). Immediately identify the 40 usual suspects that give a high level of certainty to decide on Bid / No Bid. IMPLEMENTED SOLUTION: Detection of over 40 key points in 5 minutes instead of several hours. Risk analysis on topics like finance, contract, legal... Additional note: No effort thanks to the use of the Aitenders standard for Bid / No Bid risk detection (+400 criteria). Customization: a few hours. Specific detection models: 3 weeks. RESULTS: 95% TIME SAVED ON IDENTIFYING KEY POINTS. MORE CAPACITY FOR BETTER SELECTION. +1,000 HOURS SAVED PER YEAR

projects.title: Requirement management for a €10Bn Design & Build tender – Consortium of 15 companies.
projects.description: CONTEXT: The Paris Metro Line 15 is a 2-year Design & Build tender, with an estimated value of about €10Bn. Our client is the Consortium, including NGE, Webuilt, Equans, and all their partners (architects, engineering firms, subcontractors, etc.). CLIENT'S OBJECTIVES: Ensure efficiency in the distribution of the work scope among the 15 different entities of the consortium. Produce a flawless requirement compliance matrix. Collectively track and identify the impacts of changes related to questions/answers. Identify version changes and collectively analyze their impacts. IMPLEMENTED SOLUTION: Automatic detection and extraction of requirements. Automatic classification. Collaborative scope and baseline. Automatic detection of version changes. Import of Q&A and impact analysis. Additional note: 2-hour training session for the 150 team members. 2 hours of training for 10 managers. RESULTS: THOUSANDS OF MAN-DAYS SAVED. FEWER RISKS. ENSURING A HIGH LEVEL OF COMPLIANCE

team_20.title: Further empower your teams
team_20.description: For semi-complex offers, discover features that add a strategic dimension to your business development.

cards.title: Semantic Analysis
cards.description: Understand the nuances and hidden intentions in documents thanks to advanced AI.

cards.title: Risk Scoring
cards.description: Automatically assess the risk level of each clause to prioritize your efforts.

cards.title: Summary Generation
cards.description: Get clear and concise summaries of your projects' key points in seconds.

cards.title: Automated Compliance
cards.description: Check the compliance of your documents against current standards and regulations.

cards.title: Strategic Recommendations
cards.description: Receive proactive suggestions to optimize your responses and strengthen your position.

cards.title: Knowledge-Linked Writing
cards.description: Reuse and adapt your validated content from the knowledge base and past projects for greater consistency and speed.

cta.title: Discover how Aitenders meets your exact needs
cta.subtitle: No generic demo. No sales spam. Just three quick questions.
cta.card_message: Hello! I'm going to help you find the ideal Aitenders solution for your team. What is your industry?
cta.card_button: Click to start your personalized assessment...

header_26.title: Every requirement mastered, every risk under control
header_26.subtitle: Analyze, validate, and secure your complex tenders from day one.

scrolling_logos.title: Used by leaders in engineering and construction

ai_copilot.title: The AI that eliminates omissions, inconsistencies, and delays in your major tenders
ai_copilot.subtitle: The only platform designed to ensure compliance and accelerate your responses from day one.
ai_copilot.step1: Intelligent analysis of thousands of pages and capture of requirements
ai_copilot.step2: Immediate detection of omissions, inconsistencies, and rejection risks
ai_copilot.step3: Collaborative management of every evolution for a solid and competitive offer

offer_steps_headline.title: We guide your teams through every step of complex tenders

features.feature1_title: Start with structured and intelligent data
features.feature1_desc: Thanks to AI assistants, your documents are automatically organized into a database: requirements identified, key points summarized, similarities and contradictions detected. The project team starts on a clear basis, ready for analysis, without initial manual processing.
features.feature1_stat: 100% of requirements detected and organized from the start
features.feature1_popup: Aitenders' AI automatically structures your files, classifies information, identifies requirements, and summarizes critical points. The bid manager thus provides an intelligible and usable base, avoiding days of manual processing.
features.feature2_desc: Aitenders automatically generates the compliance matrix, assigns requirements to experts, and structures the expected deliverables. Each expert knows their scope, risk areas are clearly visible, and the response strategy is built as a team.
features.feature2_popup: The platform allows for fluid collaboration between experts thanks to a dynamic compliance matrix. Tasks are distributed automatically, blind spots are visible, and the response is consolidated collectively, without depending on fragmented Excel files.
features.feature3_title: Manage every change, without missing anything
features.feature3_desc: Modifications are detected and versioned automatically. Discrepancies are flagged instantly, allowing their impact to be measured and acted upon without delay. Q&A, versions, and amendments are centralized to ensure a coherent and compliant offer.
features.feature3_popup: Document evolutions are automatically compared, discrepancies flagged, and impacts assessed in real-time. The bid manager can thus correct issues upfront, avoid omissions and inconsistencies, and ensure flawless version management.

concrete_results.title: Concrete results for your complex tenders
concrete_results.stat1_text: of structuring and organization work done from day one
concrete_results.stat2_text: of critical requirements covered and traced in the dynamic matrix
concrete_results.stat3_text: risk of rejection due to formal non-compliance
concrete_results.cta_button: Launch the impact simulation for your own projects

team_20.title: Advanced features for your complex RFPs
team_20.description: Discover tools that add a strategic dimension and enhance control of your complex offers.

cards.title: Bulk Versioning
cards.description: Manage multiple versions of your documents simultaneously with automatic synchronization and full traceability of multi-team modifications.

cards.title: Response Writing
cards.description: Write precise and compliant responses thanks to contextual generative AI, connected to your knowledge bases.

cards.title: Back to Back
cards.description: Automate the link between client and subcontractor contracts with intelligent mapping of clauses and contractual flows.

cards.title: Link with Deliverables
cards.description: Connect each requirement to its associated deliverables to ensure real-time tracking and completeness validation.

cards.title: Sub-Requirements
cards.description: Automatically break down complex requirements into manageable sub-requirements and distribute them to the appropriate experts.

cards.title: Non-compliance Controls
cards.description: Proactively detect and correct compliance gaps with intelligent alerts before final submission.

header_26.title: Manage medium-sized offers, zero surprises
header_26.subtitle: Discover, secure, and manage every clause from day one for a faster, safer, and more competitive response.

ai_copilot.title: Your contract becomes a source of answers
ai_copilot.subtitle: Aitenders transforms static PDFs into actionable knowledge with instant summaries, AI search, and direct access to obligations from day one.

user_benefits.stat2_text: decide with confidence in the field
user_benefits.stat3_text: reduce your dependency on legal support

offer_steps_headline.title: We guide your teams at every stage of the contract

features.feature1_title: A readable and actionable contract from Day 1
features.feature1_desc: A clear summary sheet is automatically generated. It groups the essential elements of the contract and makes the information immediately usable.
features.feature1_stat: 100% of contracts summarized in an actionable sheet
features.feature1_popup: Upon importing a contract, Aitenders creates a complete and structured contract sheet. It gathers durations, renewals, notice periods, SLAs, penalties, and commitments. Teams thus have a reliable, readable, and actionable basis from day one, without having to browse the original PDF.
features.feature2_title: Find every critical clause in one click
features.feature2_desc: Contracts are organized by themes. Each user directly accesses the sought-after clause without rereading the entire document.
features.feature2_stat: 80% of time saved on manual search
features.feature2_popup: Aitenders automatically classifies the contract into thematic sections. Users navigate by categories to immediately identify the relevant clause. This structuring reduces tedious rereading, limits errors, and provides targeted and reliable access to critical information.
features.feature3_title: Ask your questions, the AI answers
features.feature3_desc: The Q&A engine responds in natural language and provides the exact clause with its source, immediately available.
features.feature3_stat: 80% of questions handled without legal services
features.feature3_popup: Teams ask their questions directly in the interface. The AI identifies the clause, cites its source, and provides an immediately usable answer. The answers can be archived and shared, avoiding legal solicitations and speeding up the processing of requests.

concrete_results.stat1_text: of time to access key clauses
concrete_results.stat2_text: of questions handled without soliciting legal
concrete_results.stat3_text: of decisions aligned with contractual commitments

team_20.title: Smart options for your contracts
team_20.description: Transform your PDFs into intelligent assistants, usable at any time by every project stakeholder.

cards.title: Thematic Search
cards.description: Directly access critical clauses (duration, SLA, penalties, termination) organized by themes without rereading the entire contract.

cards.title: Traceability Sharing
cards.description: Share explicit sheets with the complete history of consultations and decisions to ensure collaboration and accountability.

cards.title: Clause Annotation
cards.description: Add notes or operational clarifications directly to clauses to facilitate use by field teams.

cards.title: Obligation Reminders
cards.description: Receive automatic alerts on deadlines, penalties, and renewals to avoid oversights and disputes.

cards.title: Multi-device Access
cards.description: Consult your contracts securely on mobile or tablet for quick and reliable decisions in the field.

cards.title: Compliance View
cards.description: Generate a consolidated view of all obligations and penalties, showing coverage and discrepancies in real time.

header_26.title: Every commitment tracked, every action traced
header_26.subtitle: Centralize your commitments, track your actions, and anticipate contractual deviations for responsive projects without administrative overload.

ai_copilot.title: Switch from reactive tracking to proactive management
ai_copilot.subtitle: Aitenders centralizes your commitments, detects deviations in real time, and traces every action to secure your medium-sized projects.

user_benefits.stat2_text: link every action to the commitment

offer_steps_headline.title: We support your teams at every stage of the project

features.feature1_title: Structure your documents and criteria from Day 1
features.feature1_desc: Aitenders automatically organizes contracts, schedules, and annexes. You start with a clear and actionable project base, without manual intervention.
features.feature1_stat: 100% of projects structured from day one
features.feature1_popup: Upon importing the initial documents, Aitenders generates an intelligible and actionable project base. Contracts, schedules, and annexes are organized around the actual commitments to be monitored. This structuring avoids starting from scratch, eliminates weeks of preparation, and provides the team with a reliable and readable basis from day one.
features.feature2_desc: Each clause becomes a tracked and documented action. You know who does what, when, and why, without relying on Excel or scattered emails.
features.feature2_stat: 100% of actions linked to their commitments
features.feature2_popup: Aitenders transforms each clause into a traceable action. Responsibilities are assigned, dated, and justified. The project remains readable and documented without depending on scattered files or informal exchanges. The bid manager and the teams have total and shared visibility on the progress of obligations.
features.feature3_desc: AI and your teams detect sensitive areas before they become disputes. You instantly access reliable and sourced information.
features.feature3_stat: 80% of deviations detected before they become claims
features.feature3_popup: Thanks to intelligent detection and contractual search, Aitenders identifies critical points before they escalate. Every commitment, history, or clause is immediately accessible with its source. Decisions are made on concrete evidence, not intuition, ensuring a project that is under control and anticipated rather than reactive.

cards.title: Action Q&A

offer_steps_headline.title: We support your teams in the execution of complex projects

features.feature1_title: Start with a clear and total vision
features.feature1_desc: Every modification automatically impacts related requirements and questions. You go from a fragmented puzzle to an actionable and coherent vision.
features.feature1_stat: 80% of time saved on initial scoping
features.feature1_popup: From the very first documents, Aitenders links every explicit and implicit requirement to its source. The impacts of changes are tracked, contradictions identified, and links created automatically. This immediate structuring avoids any manual interpretation and eliminates information loss. From Day 1, your teams have a clear, actionable, and shared vision to manage the project.
features.feature2_desc: Analyze budgets, costs, and deadlines with guided indicators. Decisions are made collectively in real time for greater efficiency.
features.feature2_stat: 30% of time saved on review cycles
features.feature2_popup: Thanks to analyses guided by your indicators, Aitenders clarifies budgets, costs, deadlines, and risks. The impacts of each action are measured immediately to explore the best solutions. The team works in Living Management mode, able to integrate changes, adapt the strategy, and maintain team alignment throughout the project.
features.feature3_title: Master your requirements down to the last line
features.feature3_desc: All requirements are integrated and linked to the final documents. Compliance becomes a continuous thread throughout execution.
features.feature3_popup: Aitenders organizes every explicit, implicit, or scattered requirement into a centralized base. Thanks to cross-references, compliance becomes a Living Thread, integrated at every stage of execution. Your final documents are justified and traceable, offering total control and generalized transparency across the entire project.

concrete_results.title: Concrete results for your complex projects
concrete_results.stat1_text: of the initial work done from day one
concrete_results.stat2_text: of time on review and decision cycles
concrete_results.cta_button: Launch the impact simulation on your projects

projects.title: Systematize the discovery and launch of over 400 tenders per year.
projects.description: CONTEXT: A team of 5 engineers needing to analyze over 400 tenders per year in the consulting engineering field. Tender documents are mainly in English, French, and Spanish. Average of 200 to 300 pages per tender. CLIENT'S OBJECTIVES: Save time in identifying risks and anticipating bottlenecks. Quickly identify if we need to involve partners/subcontractors. Mobilize the support team. Immediately identify Bid / No Bid criteria. Identify the main risks (technical, financial, and legal). IMPLEMENTED SOLUTION: Automatic classification of clauses by categories. Capture of key risks and opportunities. Export and integration into the existing process. Additional note: Setup: 2 hours. Team training limited to 2 x 1h. RESULTS: 20/30% LESS TIME. -10/15H PER PROJECT. €300–500K/YEAR

projects.title: Extract and produce the requirement compliance matrix for a €40M tender.
projects.description: CONTEXT: The project was a partial project for the supply of an integrated metro traction system for a new metro line in France. The client had to identify over 2,000 requirements in about 50 different technical documents. The team consisted of 10 people, involving 3 different Business Units. CLIENT'S OBJECTIVES: Immediately and correctly identify and store all requirements identified by the client. Identify other requirements impacting the scope and costing of the offer. Allow the team to have a standardized and simplified common review around all requirements. Quickly deliver a fully reviewed and accurate compliance matrix to their clients. IMPLEMENTED SOLUTION: Requirement detection. PBS, WBS classification. Import of answers – Association of questions. Version gap analysis (V1 > V2). Requirement coverage. Additional note: One session for Project Directors (1h) to launch the project organization. 1h of training for the rest of the team (9 members). RESULTS: COMPLIANCE MATRIX DELIVERED WITHOUT GAPS. ABOUT 30% LESS TIME ON THE ENTIRE PROCESS

projects.title: Automate your Bid / No Bid: Go from 7,000 opportunities to 700 well-qualified tenders!
projects.description: CONTEXT: Our client receives over 7,000 opportunities per year by email from a sourcing software. The existing filtering system is ineffective as it is based on a few generic keywords. The tender managers have to open each tender and read the first few pages to see if there is potential to be a main contractor or subcontractor on the project. CLIENT'S OBJECTIVES: Drastically reduce the average time spent on the selection process (currently 1 hour per tender). Immediately identify the 40 usual suspects that give a high level of certainty to decide on Bid / No Bid. IMPLEMENTED SOLUTION: Detection of over 40 key points in 5 minutes instead of several hours. Risk analysis on topics like finance, contract, legal... Additional note: No effort thanks to the use of the Aitenders standard for Bid / No Bid risk detection (+400 criteria). Customization: a few hours. Specific detection models: 3 weeks. RESULTS: 95% TIME SAVED ON IDENTIFYING KEY POINTS. MORE CAPACITY FOR BETTER SELECTION. +1,000 HOURS SAVED PER YEAR

projects.title: Requirement management for a €10Bn Design & Build tender – Consortium of 15 companies.
projects.description: CONTEXT: The Paris Metro Line 15 is a 2-year Design & Build tender, with an estimated value of about €10Bn. Our client is the Consortium, including NGE, Webuilt, Equans, and all their partners (architects, engineering firms, subcontractors, etc.). CLIENT'S OBJECTIVES: Ensure efficiency in the distribution of the work scope among the 15 different entities of the consortium. Produce a flawless requirement compliance matrix. Collectively track and identify the impacts of changes related to questions/answers. Identify version changes and collectively analyze their impacts. IMPLEMENTED SOLUTION: Automatic detection and extraction of requirements. Automatic classification. Collaborative scope and baseline. Automatic detection of version changes. Import of Q&A and impact analysis. Additional note: 2-hour training session for the 150 team members. 2 hours of training for 10 managers. RESULTS: THOUSANDS OF MAN-DAYS SAVED. FEWER RISKS. ENSURING A HIGH LEVEL OF COMPLIANCE

team_20.title: Premium features for flawless execution
team_20.description: Activate advanced options for total control, consistent governance, and consolidated traceability at every stage.

cards.title: Native Requirements
cards.description: Each deliverable automatically inherits business and technical requirements, with precise traceability from its conception.

cards.title: Client Requirement Management
cards.description: Automatically deploy changes to baseline requirements with validation and measured impact on project performance.

cards.title: Compliance Coverage
cards.description: Continuously monitor business, technical, and quality compliance to immediately detect and correct any deviation.

cards.title: Tracked Audits
cards.description: Every decision is documented with automatic auditability based on traceable and verifiable evidence.

cards.title: Multi-team Collaboration
cards.description: A collective space automatically synchronizes every discipline and stakeholder involved in the project's execution.

header_26.title: A clear and immediate go / no-go analysis
header_26.subtitle: Analyze, validate, and secure your fast-track projects from day one with AI to save time and avoid false starts.

ai_copilot.title: Decide go / no-go with full confidence
ai_copilot.subtitle: Aitenders analyzes your files in minutes, prioritizes critical points, and guides validation to guarantee your internal processes.
ai_copilot.step2: Clear and prioritized view of risks

user_benefits.stat1_text: save several days of manual review
user_benefits.stat2_text: get a go / no-go decision in under 48h

offer_steps_headline.title: We support your teams at every stage of analysis

features.feature1_title: Analyze and prioritize your documents from Day 1
features.feature1_desc: AI assistants detect criteria of interest, critical points, and evidence in minutes. The Bid Manager starts with a clear and actionable base.
features.feature1_stat: Go / no-go decision possible in a few minutes
features.feature1_popup: Thanks to automatic analysis, your documents are instantly classified and prioritized. Key criteria, blocking points, and evidence are detected and organized. The Bid Manager gets a global vision of the project and can immediately identify potential risks to quickly decide on a go / no-go.
features.feature2_title: Get a clear and prioritized view
features.feature2_desc: Aitenders generates a centralized visual summary with criteria, values, and sources. No more hundreds of pages or scattered files.
features.feature2_stat: Internal review ready in a few minutes
features.feature2_popup: The platform automatically produces a clear and prioritized summary of all detected criteria. Each element is linked to its source document. Teams no longer need to browse hundreds of pages or juggle multiple files: everything is centralized in a visual and immediately usable table.
features.feature3_title: Validate and archive each element easily
features.feature3_desc: Confirm, adjust, or reject each point identified by the AI. Each validation is logged and integrated into a complete file.
features.feature3_popup: Aitenders guides teams through step-by-step validation. Each identified element is confirmed, adjusted, or rejected, then archived with proof. This fluid process replaces manual and uncertain checks. The result: a probative, complete, and traceable file, with no gray areas or administrative overload.

concrete_results.title: Concrete results for your small bids
concrete_results.stat2_text: of critical criteria checked and traced
concrete_results.stat3_text: internal escalations, enhanced credibility in committee

team_20.title: Complementary options to secure your small bids
team_20.description: Beyond the main analysis, discover integrated functions that simplify reviews, reinforce compliance, and make your validations more reliable.

cards.title: Evidence Pack
cards.description: Use a complete validation file with sources and history, ready for committees or audits.

cards.title: Change Detection
cards.description: Instantly identify modifications between document versions, with impacts tracked on the criteria.

cards.title: Compliance Alerts
cards.description: Receive a notification if a criterion remains unvalidated to avoid any oversight before submission.

cards.title: Secure Access
cards.description: Define rights by role for managers, assistants, or reviewers to maintain control of validations.

cards.title: Exportable Reports
cards.description: Generate clear and formatted reports of all your verifications and validations, ready to be shared.

cards.title: Shared Comments
cards.description: Add annotations on criteria or documents to facilitate collaboration during reviews.

hero.title: Your AI copilot to master every tender.
hero.subtitle: From the call for tenders to delivery, Aitenders is your copilot – designed to go faster and stay aligned.

features.title: Analyze
points: Fluid collaboration with internal and external partners

features.title: Write
features.description: Create solid, aligned, and traceable responses.

features.title: Pilot
features.description: Stay in control until the end of the project.
points: Management of contractual changes and amendments
Tracking of obligations and related risks
Document traceability and bulk version management

features.title: Knowledge
features.description: Your project memory, centralized and activatable.
points: Structured sharing of deliverables and repositories
Dedicated infrastructure with customizable AI models

integrations.heading: Connect Aitenders to your business tools
integrations.description: Our platform naturally integrates with your software ecosystem. Connected to your existing tools and processes, it transforms fragmented management into a flow of connected intelligence, to secure your data and multiply the impact of your teams.
integrations.subfeature1_text:
Native integration with Microsoft Word, Excel, Teams, and SharePoint

Office 365 plug-in to automate content management
integrations.subfeature2_text:
Partner APIs (Salesforce, Procore, CRM, ERP, DMS…)

Advanced security: SaaS, dedicated instance, or on-premise deployment

kpis.heading: Simplify your tenders and gain in efficiency
kpis.description: Aitenders automates analysis, tracking, and compliance. Your teams respond faster, reduce errors, and increase their chances of success.

faq.title: Your questions about Aitenders
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about the implementation and features of Aitenders.

faq_list.question: How does Aitenders integrate with our existing processes?
faq_list.answer: The platform adapts to your current work methods, without disrupting your tools or your teams.

faq_list.question: What types of tenders can be managed with Aitenders?
faq_list.answer: All types: public, private, multi-lot, international — regardless of the sector.

faq_list.question: Is our data secure with Aitenders?
faq_list.answer: Yes. The infrastructure complies with strict standards (dedicated hosting, encryption, SSO, etc.).

faq_list.question: Can Aitenders be adapted to our sector or specific needs?
faq_list.answer: Yes. The tool is modular and configurable according to your business challenges and your organization.

faq_list.question: What support do you offer during implementation?
faq_list.answer: We provide complete onboarding: scoping, setup, training, technical support.

faq_list.question: How can we measure the ROI of Aitenders?
faq_list.answer: Through time saved, a decrease in errors, an increase in submitted responses, and a higher success rate.

homepage.mainTitle: The intelligence of your project teams,
homepage.description: Aitenders, your digital teammate to win tenders, manage contracts, and structure the knowledge and expertise of your projects.
homepage.projectSize: What is the size of your projects?
homepage.tenderManagementTitle: I respond to calls for tenders
homepage.tenderManagementDescription: Optimize your responses to calls for tenders. Analyze requirements, collaborate effectively, and maximize your chances of success.
homepage.contractExecutionDescription: Manage your projects with confidence. Track deliverables, ensure compliance, and proactively manage changes.
homepage.knowledgeManagementDescription: Capitalize on your past knowledge and experiences. Quick access to references, templates, and comparables for each new project.
homepage.smallProjectDescription: Ideal for small teams and targeted needs. Quick setup, essential features.
homepage.mediumProjectDescription: A balance between flexibility and power. Complete tools for structured and collaborative projects.

word_addon.title: Smart Draft Word Add-in
word_addon.subtitle: Get started in a few clicks
word_addon.step1_desc: Click 'Get it now' and download the add-in.
word_addon.step2_desc1: Go to the top menu bar and click the Insert tab. Find the Add-ins group and click 'Get Add-ins' or Store (the label may vary slightly depending on your version of Word).
word_addon.step2_desc2: A window will appear with the Office Store. Use the search bar to find the specific add-in you want to install.
word_addon.step2_desc3: Once you have located the plugin, click on it. Then, click the Add or Install button (depending on the add-in) and confirm the installation.
word_addon.step2_note: Note: Some add-ins may require you to sign in with a Microsoft account.
word_addon.step3_desc: The add-in will install and you will see a confirmation once it is ready to use. The plugin's commands may now be available in the Word ribbon or in a separate panel.
word_addon.support_desc: If you encounter any issues during the installation or have questions about using the Smart Draft Word Add-in, our support team is here to help you.

scope.title: 1.1 Scope
scope.p1: This Aitenders Privacy Notice ("Privacy Notice") describes how we collect, process, and disclose information about you as a natural person ("Personal Data"), and what your rights are with respect to the processing of your Personal Data. Subject to us acting as a Controller, this Privacy Notice applies when you:
list_items: visit one of our websites or social media pages,
access or use one of our applications or platforms, such as Aitenders.com and its associated instances, the Aitenders Academy, the Aitenders Community and the Aitenders Customer Portal,
register for and/or participate in events organized by or in which Aitenders participates,
otherwise interact or communicate with us.
scope.p2: These services are hereinafter collectively referred to as the "Services". If you refuse to provide your Personal Data or ask us to delete it, you may not be able to access or use the Services.

controller.title: 1.2 Name of the Controller and the Data Protection Officer
controller.p1: When we refer to "Aitenders" in this Privacy Notice, we mean the Aitenders entity that is responsible for the means and purposes of processing and thus acts as the Controller of your Personal Data, as follows:
controller.box_line1: Aitenders SAS if you are located outside of North America and for all website activities
controller.box_address: Address: 20 rue professeur Benoit Lauras 42000 Saint Etienne
controller.p2: Any data protection requests or questions can be directed to privacy@Aitenders.com.

update.title: 1.3 Update to the Privacy Policy
update.p1: We may change or replace this Privacy Notice at any time and in our sole discretion. You should regularly review the most current version of this Privacy Notice and whenever you access any of our Services.

data_categories.title: 2. Data Categories
data_categories.p1: The categories of data we process depend on your interactions with us and may include one or more of the following data categories.

contact_business.title: 2.1 Contact and Business Data
contact_business.p1: For the use of certain Services, contact data may be processed. Contact Data includes first name, last name, email address, physical address, phone number, country of origin, and similar contact information, including in some circumstances usernames and passwords. This may be supplemented with business data such as job title, company name, and other similar information.

communication_transaction.title: 2.2 Communication and Transaction Data
communication_transaction.p1: Communication data refers to data resulting from your interaction with us, e.g., emails, chat messages, webinars visited, files downloaded, and product interest information. We may also collect registration information related to your participation in one of our events, including travel information, scheduling information, dietary preferences or allergies, and accessibility requests.

application_usage.title: 2.3 Application-Related Usage Data
application_usage.p1: As is the case with most hosted service providers, we automatically collect and analyze information about how and how often specific features of our Services are used, such as details about the applications and versions used, user interactions with the Services (including searches and other actions taken by users), pages and files viewed, online training attended, types of data sources queried, and types of visualizations created.

device_browser.title: 2.4 Device and Browser Data
device_browser.p1: When you visit one of our websites or applications, online and technical information from your computer or mobile device may be collected, such as: device type, location, information about browser type and version, operating system and version, ISP or mobile carrier, IP address (or proxy server), and geographic areas derived from your IP address, time and date of access, duration of access, referring URL (if any), and identifiers that help us uniquely identify your browser or device.

origin.title: 3. Origin of data
origin.p1: In most cases, you provide us with Personal Data directly by accessing one of our websites or by registering for and/or using one of the Services. We may also obtain Personal Data from your employer in connection with the provision of the Services or from third-party providers, social networks, or partners. To enable data collection, we may use cookies, web beacons, or similar technologies (see additional information provided in our Cookie Notice).

purposes.title: 4. Purposes of processing
purposes.p1: We use the Personal Data collected as described in this Privacy Notice, as specified in any agreement incorporating this Privacy Notice, or as communicated to you in connection with the Services. We do not perform any statistical evaluation of the behavior of a data subject (profiling); in particular, there is no automated decision-making (see Art. 22 Par. 1 and Par. 4 GDPR and Art. 6 Par. 1(b) GDPR).

providing_service.title: 4.1 Provision of the Requested Service
providing_service.p1: We process your Personal Data to fulfill our contractual obligations to you, including to:
list_items: Provide and deliver products and services (including their updates);
Operate and improve our operations, systems, products, and services;
Understand your preferences to enhance your experience; and
Provide service and support, such as sending confirmations, invoices, technical notices, updates, security alerts, and administrative messages, and providing customer support and troubleshooting.

comments_questions.title: 4.2 Comments and Questions
comments_questions.p1: If you contact us via our website, by email, or in any other way, we process your Personal Data to understand and respond to your request and to provide customer service. In such circumstances, your request may be forwarded internally to the competent department at Aitenders.

sales_marketing.title: 4.3 Sales and Marketing Activities
sales_marketing.p1: We may use your email address for direct advertising, to communicate news about upcoming events, products, and services, and for surveys. We also use your email address, which we receive in connection with the sale of a product or service, for direct advertising of products or services similar to those you have ordered. Our marketing emails allow you to unsubscribe from receiving further communications by selecting the "unsubscribe" link.

statistics.title: 4.4 Statistics
statistics.p1: To improve the performance of the Services, to evaluate and improve the customer and user experience, to identify future opportunities for the development of the Services, and to assess capacity needs, we may analyze aggregated, anonymized, or statistical information based on Personal Data.

security_compliance.title: 4.5 Security and Compliance
security_compliance.p1: We may analyze your Personal Data to maintain the security of the Services and facilities, to enforce our terms and conditions; to protect, investigate, and deter fraudulent, unauthorized, or illegal activities; and to prevent and detect attacks on our website or applications or the misuse of our Services.

lawfulness.title: 5. Lawfulness of Processing
lawfulness.p1: When we collect and use your Personal Data, we will only do so if at least one of the following conditions applies:
list_items: We need to process your Personal Data to perform our responsibilities under our contract with you and to provide you with tools and services. [see Art. 6 Par. 1(b) GDPR]
We have a legitimate interest in processing your personal information. [see Art. 6 Par. 1(f) GDPR]
You have given your consent to the processing of Personal Data. [see Art. 6 Par. 1(a) GDPR]
It is necessary for us to process your Personal Data to comply with a legal obligation. [see Art. 6 Par. 1(c) GDPR]

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and other Tracking Technologies
cookies.p1: We use session and persistent "cookies" and similar technologies such as web beacons to enhance usability and compile information about the use of our websites and applications. Cookies are created either by us (first-party cookies) or by third-party providers we have designated (third-party cookies). Here are the types of cookies we use:
list_items: Necessary Cookies. Necessary Cookies are intended for the basic functionality of the website, e.g., session cookies to transmit the website, authentication cookies, and security cookies. These cookies are strictly necessary for the operation of the website.

Functional Cookies. Functional Cookies enhance the functions, performance, and services on the website, e.g., cookies used to analyze site traffic, cookies for market research, and cookies to display advertising not directed to a particular individual.
Marketing Cookies. Marketing Cookies track activity on websites to understand your interests, to target you with advertising, and to track the performance of our advertisements.
cookies.p2: Please find detailed information about cookies in our Cookie Notice.

recipients.title: 7. Recipients
recipients.p1: Your Personal Data may be transferred to Aitenders affiliates and partners as well as to a limited number of service providers (Sub-processors) who perform processing operations such as database monitoring, hosting services, ticketing, or providing software tools. These service providers process Personal Data only on our instructions and have implemented state-of-the-art technical and organizational measures to protect the processed data.
recipients.p2: When we ask third parties to host or present certain events like webinars or trainings, we may pass on your Personal Data to the respective third party who may use this data to provide access to the event or may contact you for related marketing purposes.
recipients.p3: If Personal Data is transferred to subsidiaries, partners, service providers, or third parties located outside the European Economic Area (EEA) that are not subject to an adequacy decision by the European Commission, we will ensure that this recipient offers an adequate level of data protection, for example by concluding EU Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) and implementing additional safeguards in accordance with legal requirements.
recipients.p4: We may disclose your Personal Data to comply with legal requirements, such as in response to a court order or subpoena. In such a case, we will use all reasonable and legally available measures to object to overly broad, unclear, or otherwise inappropriate requests for information.

duration.title: 8. Duration of Data Retention
duration.p1: Your Personal Data will be deleted at your request or as soon as it is no longer needed to achieve the purpose for which it was collected, namely to provide the requested Services. If legal regulations (e.g., in tax, commercial, or contract law) apply and require a longer retention of your Personal Data, or if we need your Personal Data to assert legal claims or defend against legal actions, we will retain your Personal Data until the expiration of the corresponding retention periods.
duration.p2: Any user account and its associated data in applications where we act as a Controller will be deleted at your request or after three years of inactivity.

gdpr.title: 9.1 GDPR
gdpr.p1: Upon request, we will inform you if we have stored any data about you and which data. To the extent that legal requirements are met, you have the right to have this data corrected, blocked, or deleted. You also have the right to receive the Personal Data you have provided to us, in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format, and you have the right to transmit this data to another Controller under the conditions and in accordance with the Regulation.
gdpr.p2: To the extent that we process your data on the basis of a balancing of interests, you have a right of objection if the legal conditions are met.
gdpr.p3: Where we rely on consent to process your Personal Data, you may withdraw your consent at any time for the future. However, this will not affect the lawfulness of any processing carried out before you withdraw your consent.
gdpr.box_p1: You can exercise your rights by contacting us in writing, with proof of your identity, at privacy@Aitenders.com.
gdpr.p4: If you reside in the EU, you also have the right to address questions or complaints to the lead supervisory authority.

california.title: 9.2 California Privacy Rights
california.p1: This section provides additional details about the Personal Data we collect about California residents and the rights afforded to them under the California Consumer Privacy Act or "CCPA". We extend the same rights to all U.S. residents. For purposes of the CCPA, the defined term "Personal Data" is the same as the term "Personal Information" as that term is defined in the CCPA.
